{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$1.3M in 2021-2022** on contracts with GLOBAL TOTAL OFFICE.

Across 121 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 3 have at least one amendment (2%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 73% and the average number of amendments was 2.33. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$2.2M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.46 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$69.7K. The longest contract was 3.42 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$3.3M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}

- [Global Total Office LP](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22Global%20Total%20Office%20LP%22)
{{< /details >}}
